name: InHouse Tutorials RSS Feed Dashboard Widget
author: In House Graphic Design, Inc.

sections.description: InHouse Tutorials RSS Dashboard Widget was published so we could provide quick tips for sites we build. The plugin adds a dashboard widget which is a simple RSS feed of a series of helpful tutorials.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it! You now have an RSS feed of InHouse tutorials on your dashboard.
  4. Use ‘Screen Options’ on the dashboard to control which widgets display.
sections.faq:
I don’t see the widget on my dashboard

It may be necessary to use the Screen Options to choose to display this widget.

How do I hide the widget

Use the Screen Options and uncheck the box next to InHouse Design â€“ Tutorials.
